client_profile: Family with 1 child in Brussels looking to buy a home. Budget is 760,000 to 1,175,000 EUR. Priorities include premium feel, residential atmosphere, and family-friendly amenities.
must_have: Access to schools within 20 min walk
Proximity to cafes and social spots
red_flags: High property taxes could exceed budget
Limited school options may affect commute
Home repairs might add unexpected costs
Noise from nearby main roads or constructions
contradictions: Close to schools could mean noisy environment

top_districts.name: Ixelles
why: Ixelles offers vibrant cafes around Flagey Square and peaceful parks like Parc Tenbosch.
Excellent schools nearby make it appealing for families looking for a community feel.
watch_out: Busy streets can lead to noise disturbances in certain areas.

top_districts.name: Uccle
why: Uccle features spacious homes near Parc Brugmann, ideal for families seeking outdoor space.
Quiet streets and good schools make it attractive for family living.
watch_out: Home prices can be higher than in nearby areas, affecting budget.

top_districts.name: Woluwe-Saint-Pierre
why: This district provides ample green spaces like Parc de Woluwe, perfect for children.
Family-friendly facilities and schools make it a convenient choice for parents.
watch_out: Limited shopping options may require longer commutes for essentials.

real_estate_sites.name: Immoweb
real_estate_sites.note: Major real estate platform in Belgium.

real_estate_sites.name: Realo
real_estate_sites.note: Reliable market insights and property details.

agencies.name: Brussels Properties
agencies.note: Reputable agency specializing in family homes.

agencies.name: Immobiliere J.L.
agencies.note: Local agency with good neighborhood knowledge.

questions_for_agent_landlord: What is the total purchase price including fees?
Are there any pending building works on the property?
What is the property tax situation in this area?
How is the neighborhood during weekends or evenings?
Are there schools within walking distance?
next_steps: Research schools based on priority needs.
Obtain financing pre-approval for budget range.
Explore local amenities for family activities.
clarifying_questions: What specific home features are essential?
Are there preferred school types or ratings?
Is public transport a priority for commuting?
